name: Blaster Rivals
description:
Blaster Rivals is a local 2-4 player action-combat party game, where the main objective involves eliminating your opponents in spectacular fashion by collecting upgrades around the map, all while avoiding map hazards, dodging blaster fire and hiding behind cover.

The game also provides both full controller and keyboard & mouse support. 

Meet our talented team at JJ+:

Game Designers: 
- Giacomo Okello
- Ally Drewett
- Matilda Jones

Artists: 
- Joshua Ledgerwood - Environment & VFX Artist
- Mackenzie Willey - Character Artist
- Leone Powell - UI & UX Artist

Programmers: 
- Connor Mills
- Joshua Bostock

Hope you enjoy our small student-made project! 

♥ From the team at JJ+ ♥
